title: Korea expands AI education, but long-term vision in question
description: South Korea is pushing to cultivate “artificial intelligence talent,” a core pledge of President Lee Jae Myung, who has vowed to make the country one of the world’s “top three AI powerhouses.” “We must fully implement AI education,” Lee said during a press conference in September marking 100 days since his inauguration. “We must build the capacity of our people to adapt to and use AI.” As education authorities race to embed artificial intelligence into classrooms nationwide, some critics warn th

title: Maths Over Coding? AI Godfather Yann LeCun Explains What Skills Will Matter Most in AI Era
description: AI godfather sparks academic debate!Yann LeCun says strong fundamentals matter more than chasing tech trends.

title: Canaccord Genuity Group Issues Pessimistic Forecast for Tempus AI (NASDAQ:TEM) Stock Price
description: Tempus AI (NASDAQ:TEM – Get Free Report) had its price target reduced by analysts at Canaccord Genuity Group from $95.00 to $80.00 in a research report issued on Monday, MarketBeat.com reports. The firm currently has a “buy” rating on the stock. Canaccord Genuity Group’s price target indicates a potential upside of 23.61% from the stock’s [...]

title: Best Artificial Intelligence Stocks To Research – December 22nd
description: Hut 8, BigBear.ai, and Tempus AI are the three Artificial Intelligence stocks to watch today, according to MarketBeat’s stock screener tool. title: The artificial intelligence paradox we must confront
description: Dear Editor,The irony could not be starker.Across leading universities, the very programmes best equipped to examine the social, ethical, and political consequences of artificial intelligence are being defunded, even as those same institutions actively promote the widespread use of AI tools in classrooms, administration, and research.The article The artificial intelligence paradox we must confront appeared first on Stabroek News.
